title: How to Make Lime and Ginger Lemonade

steps.headline: Peel and cut ginger into small stripes.
Pour water and sugar into saucepan.
Remove the saucepan from the heat and cover it with a lid.
steps.description: Leave it to infuse for about 20 minutes.

steps.headline: After 20 minutes, do a taste test to see if the ginger flavor is strong enough.
steps.description: If not, allow to infuse for longer.

steps.headline: Strain the syrup and pour it into a glass jar.
steps.description: Allow it to cool down completely.

steps.headline: Pour the cooled syrup into a glass jug or pitcher.
Cut limes into half and remove any seeds.
Squeeze the limes in the glass jug or pitcher.
Add the 3 more cups of water and stir.
steps.description:

steps.headline: Lime and Ginger lemonade is ready!

text:
Peel and cut ginger into small stripes. Pour water and sugar into saucepan. Bring to boil. Add the ginger strips. Boil for 2 more minutes. Remove the saucepan from the heat and cover it with a lid. Leave it to infuse for about 20 minutes. After 20 minutes, do a taste test to see if the ginger flavor is strong enough. If not, allow to infuse for longer. Strain the syrup and pour it into a glass jar. Allow it to cool down completely. Pour the cooled syrup into a glass jug or pitcher. Cut limes into half and remove any seeds. Squeeze the limes in the glass jug or pitcher. Add the 3 more cups of water and stir. Refrigerate. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/f3/Make-Lime-and-Ginger-Lemonade-Step-12Bullet1.jpg/v4-459px-Make-Lime-and-Ginger-Lemonade-Step-12Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/f/f3/Make-Lime-and-Ginger-Lemonade-Step-12Bullet1.jpg/aid1879450-v4-728px-Make-Lime-and-Ginger-Lemonade-Step-12Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":306,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"485","licensing":"
